sentences.sContent: Salt decomposes into sodium and chlorine.
Well, this chlorine has taken one electron from the sulfur.
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, this chlorine has taken one electron from the sulfur.
sentences.sCn: 对了，这个氯从硫那里得到了一个电子。

sentences.sContent: These substances are sometimes combined with other chemicals, such as chlorine.
sentences.sContent_eng: These substances are sometimes combined with other chemicals, such as chlorine.
sentences.sCn: 这些物质有时可与其他化学品化合，例如氯。

words.tran: 用氯消毒；使氯化；使氯发生作用

trans.tranOther: a greenish-yellow gas with a strong smell that is used to keep the water in swimming pools clean. It is a chemical element: symbol Cl
